00067     class ostreamable {
00068     public:
00070       ostreamable() {}
00072       virtual ~ostreamable() {}
00073       
00074     protected:
00084       virtual std::ostream &print_to(std::ostream &out) const =0;

00119

00126   inline ostream &operator<<(ostream &out, 
00127                           TREX::utils::ostreamable const &x) {

00129   }
